name: TIMEOUT_ANSWERS
description: This table stores the answers to the timeout questions.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the timeout record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: CM_CT_OWNER_ID
columns.description: The Community ID (CID) of the instance that owns this contact. This is only populated if you use IntraConnect.

columns.name: CONTACT_SERIAL_NUM
columns.description: The contact serial number (CSN) of the contact.

columns.name: CONTACT_NUM
columns.description: This stores the contact number for the contact.

columns.name: CNCT_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The contact type category number for the timeout record.

columns.name: CORRECT_PAT_C_NAME
columns.description: The correct patient category number for the timeout question. This stores the result of the "Is this the correct patient?" question for the timeout.

columns.name: CORRECT_SITE_C_NAME
columns.description: The correct site category number for the timeout question. This stores the result of the "Is this the correct site?" question for the timeout.

columns.name: CORRECT_SIDE_C_NAME
columns.description: The correct side category number for the timeout question. This stores the result of the "Is this the correct side?" question for the timeout.

columns.name: CORRECT_POSITION_C_NAME
columns.description: The correct position category number for the timeout question. This stores the result of the "Is this the correct position?" question for the timeout.

columns.name: CORRECT_EQUIPMENT_C_NAME
columns.description: The correct equipment category number for the timeout question. This stores the result of the "Is this the correct equipment?" question for a the timeout.

columns.name: CORRECT_PROC_C_NAME
columns.description: The correct procedure category number for the timeout question. This stores the result of the "Is this the correct procedure?" question for the timeout.

columns.name: SITE_MARKED_C_NAME
columns.description: The site marked status category number for the timeout question. This stores the result of the "Is the site marked?" question for the timeout.

columns.name: IMPLANTS_PRESENT_C_NAME
columns.description: The implants present category number for the timeout question. This item stores the result of the "Are the implants present?" question for the timeout.

columns.name: ANTIBIOTICS_ORDER_C_NAME
columns.description: The antibiotics ordered and given status category number for the timeout question. This stores the result of the "Have the antibiotics been ordered and given?" question for the timeout.

columns.name: HP_NOTE_COMP_C_NAME
columns.description: The H&P note complete status category number for the timeout question. This stores the result of the "H&P note complete?" question for the timeout.

columns.name: CONSENTS_VERIFIED_C_NAME
columns.description: The consent verified category number for the timeout question. This stores the result of the "Are consents verified?" question for the timeout.

columns.name: RAD_STUDIES_AVAIL_C_NAME
columns.description: The radiology studies available status category number for the timeout question. This stores the result of the "Are the radiology studies available?" question for the timeout.

columns.name: REL_LAB_AVAIL_C_NAME
columns.description: The relevant lab result available status category number for the timeout question. This stores the result of the "Are the relevant lab results available?" question for the timeout.

columns.name: SAFETY_PREC_C_NAME
columns.description: The safety precautions reviewed status category number for the timeout question. This stores the result of the "Are safety precautions reviewed?" question for the timeout.

columns.name: ALLERGIES_REVW_C_NAME
columns.description: The allergy reviewed status category number for the timeout question. This stores the result of the "Are allergies reviewed?" question for the timeout.

columns.name: SURGEON_READY_C_NAME
columns.description: The surgeon/physician ready status category number for the timeout question. This stores the result of the "Is the surgeon/physician ready?" question for the timeout.

columns.name: PULSE_OXIMETER_ON_C_NAME
columns.description: The pulse oximeter is on patient status category number for the timeout question. This stores the result of the "Is a pulse oximeter on the patient?" question for the timeout.

columns.name: DIFFICULT_AIRWAY_C_NAME
columns.description: The patient has a difficult airway for intubation status category number for the timeout question. This stores the result of the "Does the patient have a difficult airway for intubation?" question for the timeout.

columns.name: AIR_ASSIST_AVAIL_C_NAME
columns.description: The assistance available for a difficult patient airway status category number for the timeout question. This stores the result of the "Is there assistance available for a difficult patient airway?" question for the timeout.

columns.name: HIGH_BLOOD_RISK_C_NAME
columns.description: The risk of high blood loss status category number for the timeout question. This stores the result of the "Is there risk of high blood loss?" question for the timeout.

columns.name: FLUIDS_AVAIL_C_NAME
columns.description: The fluids available for blood status category number for the timeout question. This stores the result of the "Are there adequate fluids available to replenish high blood loss?" question for the timeout.

columns.name: ANES_SAFETY_C_NAME
columns.description: The anesthesia safety check complete status category number for the timeout question. This stores the result of the "Is the anesthesia safety checklist complete?" question for the timeout.

columns.name: REQ_PRODUCTS_C_NAME
columns.description: The required products category number for the timeout question. This stores the result of the "Are any blood products & devices required for the procedure available?" question for the timeout.

columns.name: OTHER_DOC_VERIFY_C_NAME
columns.description: The other documentation verified status category number for the timeout question. This stores the result of the "Is documentation verified?" question for the timeout.

columns.name: TEAM_INTRODUCED_C_NAME
columns.description: The all team members introduced status category number for the timeout question. This stores the result of the "Have all team members been introduced?" question for the timeout.

columns.name: SURGEON_REVIEW_C_NAME
columns.description: The surgeon/physician reviewed critical steps status category number for the timeout question. This stores the result of the "Has the surgeon/physician reviewed the critical steps?" question for the timeout.

columns.name: ANES_REVIEW_C_NAME
columns.description: The anesthesiologist has reviewed patient status category number for the timeout question. This stores the result of the "Has the anesthesiologist reviewed the patient?" question for the timeout.

columns.name: STERILE_REVIEW_C_NAME
columns.description: The reviewed sterility status category number for the timeout question. This stores the result of the "Has the nursing team reviewed the sterility?" question for the timeout.

columns.name: EQUIP_REVIEW_C_NAME
columns.description: The reviewed equipment problems status category number for the timeout question. This stores the result of the "Has the nursing staff reviewed the equipment for potential problems?" question for the timeout.

columns.name: FLUID_AVAIL_IRRIG_C_NAME
columns.description: The fluids available for irrigation status category number for the timeout question. This stores the result of the "Are adequate antibiotics and irrigation fluids available?" question for the timeout.

columns.name: COUNTS_CORRECT_C_NAME
columns.description: The counts are correct status category number for the timeout question. This stores the result of the "Are counts correct?" question for the timeout.

columns.name: SPECIMEN_LABELED_C_NAME
columns.description: The specimen labeled status category number for the timeout question. This stores the result of the "Have specimens been labeled?" question for the timeout.

columns.name: EQUIP_PROB_ADDR_C_NAME
columns.description: The equipment problems addressed status category number for the timeout question. This stores the result of the "Have all new equipment problems been addressed?" question for the timeout.

columns.name: RECOVERY_REVIEW_C_NAME
columns.description: The recovery issue reviewed status category number for the timeout question. This stores the result of the "Have all recovery issues been reviewed?" question for the timeout.

columns.name: INSTANT_OF_ENT_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the instant of entry when a record is edited

columns.name: UNOS_ID_VERIFIED_C_NAME
columns.description: The United Network for Organ Sharing (UNOS) ID verified status category number for the timeout question. This stores the result of the "Is the UNOS ID verified?" question for the timeout.

columns.name: BLOOD_TYPE_VER_C_NAME
columns.description: The blood type verified status category number for the timeout question. This stores the result of the "Is the blood type verified?" question for the timeout.

columns.name: ORGAN_TYPE_VER_C_NAME
columns.description: The blood type verified status category number for the timeout question. This stores the result of the "Is the organ type verified?" question for the timeout.

columns.name: ANS_FLT_ID
columns.description: Stores the flowsheet template ID used for the timeout. Flowsheets can be used in place of SmartForms to answer questions pertaining to the timeout being performed.

columns.name: ANS_FLT_ID_DISPLAY_NAME
columns.description: The display name associated with this template.

columns.name: FLOWSHEET_DTTM
columns.description: This item stores the instant that the flowsheet responses used for the timeout were saved. Flowsheets can be used in place of SmartForms to answer questions pertaining to the timeout being performed.

columns.name: STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: The timeout status category number for the timeout.

columns.name: PAT_ID_BAND_ON_C_NAME
columns.description: The patient ID band on status category number for the timeout question.

columns.name: RAD_IMGS_AVAIL_C_NAME
columns.description: The radiology images and result available status category number for the timeout question.

columns.name: BRIEFING_OCCURRED_C_NAME
columns.description: The briefing has occurred status category number for the timeout question.

columns.name: TEAM_PRESENT_C_NAME
columns.description: The all team members present during timeout status category number for the timeout question.

columns.name: HANDOFF_TO_STAFF_ID
columns.description: The provider ID of the staff member who the handoff was to. This stores the answer to the "Handoff to (staff member)?" question for a timeout.

columns.name: HANDOFF_TO_STAFF_C_NAME
columns.description: The procedural staff type category number for the handoff to staff type question in the timeout. This stores the result of "Handoff to (staff type)?" question for the timeout.

columns.name: HNDOFF_FRM_STAFF_ID
columns.description: The provider ID of the staff member who the handoff was from. This stores the answer to the "Handoff from (staff member)?" question for a timeout.

columns.name: SITE_MARK_VISIBLE_C_NAME
columns.description: The site marks visible after prep status category number for the timeout question.

columns.name: FIRE_RISK_C_NAME
columns.description: The fire risk level category number for the timeout question.

columns.name: TEAM_AGREE_C_NAME
columns.description: The all team members agreed to proceed status category number for the timeout question.

columns.name: ANES_PREOP_NOTE_C_NAME
columns.description: The anesthesia pre-op note complete status category number for the timeout question.

columns.name: MEDS_LABELED_C_NAME
columns.description: The medication labeled status category number for the timeout question. This item is used during the timeout workflow.

columns.name: PT_MED_HX_REVIEW_C_NAME
columns.description: The patient medical history reviewed status category number for the timeout question.

columns.name: ASA_CLASS_REVIEW_C_NAME
columns.description: The American Society of Anesthesiologists (ASA) classification reviewed status category number for the timeout question.

columns.name: ANES_TYPE_REVIEW_C_NAME
columns.description: The anesthesia type reviewed status category number for the timeout question.

columns.name: PT_USE_ANTICOAG_C_NAME
columns.description: The patient use of anticoagulants reviewed status category number for the timeout question.

columns.name: PRE_SURG_MEDS_C_NAME
columns.description: The pre-procedure medications reviewed status category number for the timeout question.

columns.name: CORRECT_PROC_DOC_C_NAME
columns.description: The correct procedure documented status category number for the timeout question.

columns.name: SURG_INSTR_REVIEW_C_NAME
columns.description: The procedural instructions reviewed status category number for the timeout question.

columns.name: ANES_INSTR_REVIEW_C_NAME
columns.description: The anesthesia instructions reviewed status category number for the timeout question.

columns.name: LDA_REVIEW_C_NAME
columns.description: The Lines, Drains, and Airways (LDAs) reviewed status category number for the timeout question.

columns.name: PT_READY_TRANSFER_C_NAME
columns.description: The patient ready to transfer status category number for the timeout question.

columns.name: NEXT_DEPT_CONTACT_C_NAME
columns.description: The receiving department contact category number for the timeout question.

columns.name: PERI_PRO_COD_DISC_C_NAME
columns.description: The peri-procedural code discussed status category number for the timeout question.

columns.name: MEDS_VERB_CONF_C_NAME
columns.description: The available meds verbally confirmed status category number for the timeout question. This stores the response category number for whether the meds are available on the procedural field. The goal is to do a quick verification prior to incision and state what meds are on the field for physician use.

columns.name: VTE_PROPH_START_C_NAME
columns.description: The VTE prophylaxis started status category number for the timeout question. This stores the response category number for whether the patient had a Venous Thromboembolism (VTE) prophylaxis started prior to the start of the procedure.

columns.name: AUTH_USER_ID
columns.description: The ID of the provider who is considered as the authorizing user for the timeout or the authorizing user to skip the timeout.

columns.name: MEDS_SECURED_C_NAME
columns.description: The Medications Secured category number which indicates whether medications not administered have been secured.

columns.name: PAT_USE_BETABLOCK_C_NAME
columns.description: The patient use of beta blockers category number for the timeout which indicates whether a beta blocker plan was reviewed.

columns.name: PREFCARD_CHNG_REV_C_NAME
columns.description: The preference card changes reviewed category number for the timeout which indicates whether preference card changes were reviewed.

columns.name: ANES_PROC_COMP_C_NAME
columns.description: The anesthesia procedure complete category number for the timeout which indicates whether necessary anesthesia procedures are complete.

columns.name: PROC_LEN_REV_C_NAME
columns.description: The anticipated procedure length category number for the timeout which indicates whether the anticipated length of procedure has been confirmed.

columns.name: NORMOTHRM_ASSURED_C_NAME
columns.description: The normothermia assured category number for the timeout which indicates whether normothermia has been assured for the patient.

columns.name: SITE_PREP_READY_C_NAME
columns.description: The site prep completed category number for the timeout which indicates whether the skin prep (Betadine, Alcohol, etc.) is complete.

columns.name: ANESTH_SITE_MARK_C_NAME
columns.description: The anesthesia site marked category number for the timeout which indicates whether the anesthesia site has been marked.

columns.name: CORRECT_LAT_C_NAME
columns.description: The correct laterality category number for the timeout which indicates whether the laterality of the procedure has been verified.

columns.name: PAT_REP_EDU_C_NAME
columns.description: The patient or legal representative educated on policies category number for the timeout which indicates whether the patient and family have been educated on organizational policies.

columns.name: PREP_SOL_DRIED_C_NAME
columns.description: The status category number for the procedural timeout question that indicates if the solution used for surgical skin prep was dry or not before draping.

columns.name: PREPSOL_POOL_PREV_C_NAME
columns.description: The status category number for the procedural timeout question that indicates if the surgical site prep solution was prevented from pooling.

columns.name: PREPSOL_INSTR_FOL_C_NAME
columns.description: The status category number for the procedural timeout question that indicates if the pre-op site prep solution instructions were followed.

columns.name: COMP_AT_APPROP_TM_C_NAME
columns.description: The status category number for the procedural timeout question that indicates whether or not a timeout was completed at the appropriate time according to organizational policies.

columns.name: BLOOD_PRODUCT_ORD_C_NAME
columns.description: The status category number for the procedural timeout question that indicates whether or not blood products were ordered.

columns.name: PREG_TEST_COMP_C_NAME
columns.description: The status category number for the procedural timeout question that indicates whether a pregnancy test was completed prior to surgery.

columns.name: EBL_CONFIRMED_C_NAME
columns.description: The status category number for the procedural timeout question that indicates if all surgical staff and surgeons present agree on the patient's estimated blood loss during surgery.

columns.name: FIRE_SURG_SITE_HT_C_NAME
columns.description: The category number for the Fire Risk Surgical Site Height item. This is usually the same as the internal ID. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Community ID (CID).

columns.name: FIRE_OXYGEN_SRC_C_NAME
columns.description: The category number for the Fire Risk Open Oxygen Source item. This is usually the same as the internal ID. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Community ID (CID).

columns.name: FIRE_IGNITION_SRC_C_NAME
columns.description: The category number for the Fire Risk Ignition Source item. This is usually the same as the internal ID. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Community ID (CID).

columns.name: HIGH_RISK_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time that the fire risk was upgraded to a high fire risk.

columns.name: HIGH_RISK_CMT
columns.description: A comment associated with the fire risk upgrade to a high fire risk.

columns.name: SHARPS_SAFETY_C_NAME
columns.description: The sharps safety category number for the timeout question that indicates if sharp safety was followed.
